description: Detects the download of suspicious file type from a well-known file and paste sharing domain
name: Suspicious File Download from File Sharing Domain
query: (Contents:(*https\:\/\/transfer.sh\/* OR *raw.githubusercontent.com* OR *gist.githubusercontent.com* OR *pastebin.com* OR *cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/* OR *mediafire.com* OR *mega.nz* OR *ddns.net* OR *.paste.ee* OR *.hastebin.com* OR *.ghostbin.co\/* OR *ufile.io* OR *storage.googleapis.com* OR *anonfiles.com* OR *send.exploit.in*) AND file.path.text:(*.exe\:Zone* OR *.vbs\:Zone* OR *.dll\:Zone*))
author: Florian Roth
